ygData.subject: Players List
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all...just had an Idea. We all seem to put a little here and there about what we play, what server we re on, etc. and we all want to get together with
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all...just had an Idea. We all seem to put a little here and there about
what we play, what server we're on, etc. and we all want to get together
with someone else on the same server. Well, if you send me the following
info I will make a LIST of us ALL and post it to our list. Include the
FOLLOWING Info please...

Normal Entry Info:
Character/s Name
Level/s
Character/s Gender
Class/s
Race/s
Server/s you are on

Optional:
Real Name
Email Address

With this info I think we can better coordinate our efforts to meet up
with everyone. If you want you can either post it on EQ Rainbow or you can
email me at home at : sandymann@...

Hope this helps unravel the confusion of who's where and on what server!

Sandy ( Kalell)
